design_name: mum  laser etched black granite  orchids
ml_tags: 27.01.1956 - 12.05.2021 Quinn and Ashley. We lived with the specter of death for such a long time, since you left my side. "The days are so long, and the nights are longer, and you confounded death, (and doctors) with your strength & spirit. Loving Wife of Tom; Mother of Tracey, Michelle, Amy But now your race is run, and ours has just begun. She radiated Love & Friendship Until we meet again. and Kristy; Grandmother of Ava, Ashlyn, Aubrey, Aiden, but I wish I had loved you more. There was nothing left unsaid between us, we loved deeply, to give us strength and to keep your spirit alive.     Tom" I wish so much to be with you, but you told me I had to stay behind and live my life.  I know time will help, but the huge hole in my heart can only ever partly heal. We all have such wonderful memories,
